info.name: BlogWiki_API_News
info.description:
This offical RESTAPI for **BlogWiki** news website. This API are used to control posts in BloWiki website using all 4 CRUD operation.

Below are the URLs where API are live

DEV local: [http://localhost:3000/api/posts/](http://localhost:3000/api/posts/)

Cyclic urls:

1. https://bwapi-vineelsaimeesalas-projects.vercel.app

pm.test("content = World leaders have come together at the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow to negotiate a landmark agreement aimed at addressing the urgent threat of global climate change. The agreement includes ambitious targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions, transitioning to renewable energy sources, and protecting vulnerable communities from the impacts of climate change. Key initiatives outlined in the agreement include increased funding for climate adaptation and resilience projects in developing countries, as well as commitments to phase out coal-fired power plants and invest in clean energy technologies. The COP26 summit represents a critical step forward in the global fight against climate change, signaling a renewed sense of urgency and collaboration among nations to safeguard the planet for future generations.World leaders have come together at the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow to negotiate a landmark agreement aimed at addressing the urgent threat of global climate change. The agreement includes ambitious targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions, transitioning to renewable energy sources, and protecting vulnerable communities from the impacts of climate change. Key initiatives outlined in the agreement include increased funding for climate adaptation and resilience projects in developing countries, as well as commitments to phase out coal-fired power plants and invest in clean energy technologies. The COP26 summit represents a critical step forward in the global fight against climate change, signaling a renewed sense of urgency and collaboration among nations to safeguard the planet for future generations.World leaders have come together at the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow to negotiate a landmark agreement aimed at addressing the urgent threat of global climate change. The agreement includes ambitious targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions, transitioning to renewable energy sources, and protecting vulnerable communities from the impacts of climate change. Key initiatives outlined in the agreement include increased funding for climate adaptation and resilience projects in developing countries, as well as commitments to phase out coal-fired power plants and invest in clean energy technologies. The COP26 summit represents a critical step forward in the global fight against climate change, signaling a renewed sense of urgency and collaboration among nations to safeguard the planet for future generations.World leaders have come together at the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow to negotiate a landmark agreement aimed at addressing the urgent threat of global climate change. The agreement includes ambitious targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions, transitioning to renewable energy sources, and protecting vulnerable communities from the impacts of climate change. Key initiatives outlined in the agreement include increased funding for climate adaptation and resilience projects in developing countries, as well as commitments to phase out coal-fired power plants and invest in clean energy technologies. The COP26 summit represents a critical step forward in the global fight against climate change, signaling a renewed sense of urgency and collaboration among nations to safeguard the planet for future generations.", ()=> {
